response.content:
Most of your questions were answered but sometimes you asked very basic questions.
Few days ago you posted a question that you can't drop the database and one of my student has answered your question that you've opened the terminal in the wrong place.
 I've thousand of students and it's not possible for me to trouble shoot your device issues and common human errors. The questions related to the course were answered. One year ago you've asked many questions and all of your questions were answered. If you don't believe then go to the QA section and check carefully.

results.content:
Excellent course about making restful web api's with asp.net core. I must say that this course is better than my 4 years software engineering degree because in my four year degree no one has taught me the rest api but thanks to this amazing course and this instructor (Asfend) who made my day and explains all the concepts in a very professional way.
Thanks again.

results.content:
This is probably one of the best course for making restful web services with .net core.
In my country a lot of people have MAC machine and one cannot easily make .net core development on mac because no good videos of .net core with mac version are available over the internet.
But this course brings a new life for me . When I saw the title of this course I was so excited because finally someone took the initiative to make video for students with net core over MAC machine.
Regarding the content everything was explained in a professional way.The code was explained in a very awesome way.

results.content:
I've no previous knowledge of rest api's and then I decided to learn some concepts of restful api's and as a fresher I searched on the internet and found that .net core is the best platform to make rest api's and then first I learn C# programming and right after that I took this course which is the best decision of my life. I have also created a rest api for my personal project.
Thanks for the great course.
